original_text:
The Big Easy
Informazioni generali di slot Big Easy
Software: IGT
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 20
Puntata minima: 0,01 €
Puntata massima: 100 €
Return to Player (RTP): 95,01%

Big Easy caratteristiche principali
Lo diciamo subito: Big Easy, prodotta dalla software house IGT ci è piaciuta davvero un sacco! I motivi? Innanzitutto la scelta del tema e l’ambientazione, veramente originali e coinvolgenti, che uniti a un gameplay intuitivo ma divertente e a un payout di tutto rispetto, ci portano a promuovere senza riserve questa slot!
Con Big Easy ci troviamo immersi nell’atmosfera Jazz di New Orleans, una delle capitali americane della musica: la grafica molto bella e i simboli tematici ci fanno vivere un’esperienza di gioco assai coinvolgente, ma il gioco non sarebbe così efficace da questo punto di vista senza la bellissima colonna sonora, jazz, ovviamente.
Non sono presenti giochi bonus, ma ci sono i simboli Wild e Scatter e la possibilità di ottenere dei giri gratuiti e dei moltiplicatori compensano ampiamente questa mancanza.
Inoltre i giocatori più arditi possono scommettere ulteriormente sulle proprie vincite, di qualsiasi importo esse siano, grazie alla funzione Gamble: in seguito a una vincita infatti, apparirà sulla schermata una carta girata, della quale bisognerà indovinare il colore e se la scommessa è giusta l’intero importo della vincita sarà raddoppiato, mentre in caso contrario però si perderà tutto!

Simboli regolari e speciali, Wild e Scatter di Big Easy Slot
Tutti i simboli presenti in questa slot machine sono tematici, il che rappresenta un ulteriore punto a favore di Big Easy e non ci fa sentire assolutamente la mancanza delle tradizionali carte da poker.
Troviamo quindi tra i simboli regolari dei musicisti jazz, dei pianoforti, ma anche bicchieri di whiskey e dei gamberetti sui piatti (di cui ci sfugge un po’ il senso).
Per quanto riguarda i simboli speciali, questi sono essenzialmente due: la Luna e il logo del gioco con la scritta “Big Easy”.
Il primo rappresenta lo Scatter e se compare per almeno tre volte in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli permette di ottenere ben 10 free spins.
Il logo della slot è invece il simbolo Wild: ha la funzione di Jolly e può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli, tranne lo Scatter, per completare una combinazione vincente, inoltre, se compare su tutti i cinque rulli permette di ottenere una vincita pari a 20 volte la puntata.

 
La slot gemella: Jazz of New Orleans
Ci è piaciuta talmente tanto questa slot che ne abbiamo cercato una simile per poter continuare a giocare immersi nell’atmosfera fumosa dei locali jazz di New Orleans: ne abbiamo trovato una praticamente gemella, in cui tema e ambientazione sono gli stessi.
Si tratta di Jazz of New Orleans, prodotta dalla software house Play’n Go: questa slot ha una grafica pazzesca e una serie di giochi bonus che permettono di accrescere le possibilità di vincita e il divertimento! I simboli sono praticamente gli stessi e la Luna e il Logo della slot rappresentano anche qui rispettivamente lo Scatter e il Wild!
Noi consigliamo anche questa, provatela!

raw_translation.response:
The Big Easy: a slot machine that truly lives up to its name. The game, produced by IGT, is a standout for its original and engaging theme, intuitive gameplay, and impressive 95.01% return to player rate. In this slot, players are transported to the Jazz atmosphere of New Orleans, complete with music, beautiful graphics, and thematically appropriate symbols on the game board. The absence of bonus games is more than made up by the presence of Wild and Scatter symbols, and the opportunity to earn free spins and multipliers. Adding to the thrill, players can double down on their wins with the Gamble feature: correctly guessing the color of a flipped card will double the winnings, while a wrong guess will result in a total loss. 

Regular symbols include jazz musicians, pianos, whiskey glasses, and shrimp on plates, all of which are thematically appropriate and add to the overall experience. The Scatter symbol, represented by the moon, triggers free spins if it appears three or more times on the reels. The slot’s logo serves as the Wild symbol, replacing other symbols to create winning combinations and offering a payout of 20x the bet if it appears on all five reels. 

For those who can’t get enough of the Jazz of New Orleans theme, the slot Jazz of New Orleans from Play’n Go is a perfect companion: its similarly captivating atmosphere, beautiful graphics, and bonus games make it a must-play for fans of The Big Easy. 

Whether you want to test your luck or simply enjoy the music, The Big Easy is a slot machine that offers a great time. Try it for free on SlotJava, or wager real money at reliable online casinos such as NetBet or EuroBet. With so many bonus options available, including free spins and no-deposit bonuses, it’s never been easier to play the slots. So put on some jazz and spin the reels!

raw_translation.response:
The Big Easy
General Information about Big Easy Slot
Software: IGT
Reels: 5
Pay lines: 20
Minimum bet: €0.01
Maximum bet: €100
Return to Player (RTP): 95.01%

Main Features of Big Easy
Let's be clear from the start: we really loved Big Easy, produced by IGT! The reasons? Firstly, the choice of theme and setting, truly original and engaging, which, combined with an intuitive but entertaining gameplay and a respectable payout, lead us to wholeheartedly endorse this slot!
With Big Easy, we find ourselves immersed in the jazz atmosphere of New Orleans, one of the American capitals of music: the beautiful graphics and thematic symbols make for a truly captivating gaming experience, but the game would not be so effective from this point of view without the beautiful soundtrack, jazz, of course.
There are no bonus games, but there are Wild and Scatter symbols and the possibility of getting free spins and multipliers, which more than make up for this lack.
Furthermore, the most daring players can further bet on their winnings, whatever the amount, thanks to the Gamble feature: after a win, a turned card will appear on the screen and if you guess the color correctly, the entire amount of the win will be doubled, but if you guess wrong, you will lose everything!

Regular and special symbols, Wild and Scatter of Big Easy Slot
All the symbols in this slot machine are thematic, which is another point in favor of Big Easy and we don't miss the traditional poker cards at all.
We find jazz musicians, pianos, but also glasses of whiskey and shrimp on plates (which we don't quite understand) among the regular symbols.
As for the special symbols, there are essentially two: the Moon and the game logo with the words "Big Easy."
The first represents the Scatter and if it appears at least three times in any position on the reels, it allows you to get 10 free spins.
The slot logo is the Wild symbol: it acts as a wildcard and can replace all other symbols except the Scatter to complete a winning combination; moreover, if it appears on all five reels, it allows you to win a payout equal to 20 times the bet.

The twin slot: Jazz of New Orleans
We liked this slot so much that we looked for a similar one to continue playing immersed in the smoky atmosphere of jazz clubs in New Orleans: we found a practically identical one, with the same theme and setting.
It's called Jazz of New Orleans, produced by Play'n Go: this slot has amazing graphics and a series of bonus games that allow you to increase your chances of winning and have fun! The symbols are practically the same and the Moon and the logo of the slot also respectively represent the Scatter and the Wild!
We also recommend trying this one!

Review: The Big Easy
General Information about Big Easy Slot
Software: IGT
Reels: 5
Pay lines: 20
Minimum bet: €0.01
Maximum bet: €100
Return to Player (RTP): 95.01%

Main Features of Big Easy
Let's be clear from the start: we really loved Big Easy, produced by IGT! The reasons? Firstly, the choice of theme and setting, truly original and engaging, which, combined with an intuitive but entertaining gameplay and a respectable payout, lead us to wholeheartedly endorse this slot!
With Big Easy, we find ourselves immersed in the jazz atmosphere of New Orleans, one of the American capitals of music: the beautiful graphics and thematic symbols make for a truly captivating gaming experience, but the game would not be so effective from this point of view without the beautiful soundtrack, jazz, of course.
There are no bonus games, but there are Wild and Scatter symbols and the possibility of getting free spins and multipliers, which more than make up for this lack.
Furthermore, the most daring players can further bet on their winnings, whatever the amount, thanks to the Gamble feature: after a win, a turned card will appear on the screen and if you guess the color correctly, the entire amount of the win will be doubled, but if you guess wrong, you will lose everything!

Regular and special symbols, Wild and Scatter of Big Easy Slot
All the symbols in this slot machine are thematic, which is another point in favor of Big Easy and we don't miss the traditional poker cards at all.
We find jazz musicians, pianos, but also glasses of whiskey and shrimp on plates (which we don't quite understand) among the regular symbols.
As for the special symbols, there are essentially two: the Moon and the game logo with the words "Big Easy."
The first represents the Scatter and if it appears at least three times in any position on the reels, it allows you to get 10 free spins.
The slot logo is the Wild symbol: it acts as a wildcard and can replace all other symbols except the Scatter to complete a winning combination; moreover, if it appears on all five reels, it allows you to win a payout equal to 20 times the bet.

The twin slot: Jazz of New Orleans
We liked this slot so much that we looked for a similar one to continue playing immersed in the smoky atmosphere of jazz clubs in New Orleans: we found a practically identical one, with the same theme and setting.
It's called Jazz of New Orleans, produced by Play'n Go: this slot has amazing graphics and a series of bonus games that allow you to increase your chances of winning and have fun! The symbols are practically the same and the Moon and the logo of the slot also respectively represent the Scatter and the Wild!
We also recommend trying this one!


FAQ - The Big Easy
Where can I play The Big Easy for free?

You can play The Big Easy and hundreds of other slots without registering or downloading any software on SlotJava, easy right? All you need is a lot of desire to have fun!

Can I play The Big Easy with real money?

Yes, you can. Just connect to one of the many online casinos such as NetBet or EuroBet. It is very important to choose only ASM accredited casinos, which are 100% safe. In addition to having a comprehensive overview of the strengths and weaknesses of the various casinos, you can learn about the types of bonuses offered.

Absolutely yes. Online slots offer numerous advantages in terms of promotions, so you can try the slots without spending real money. On SlotJava you can learn about all the promotions that various casinos offer to their members, such as welcome bonuses or free spins. For example, NetBet offers 100 free spins + €200, EuroBet €1005.

How do you play The Big Easy?

Nothing could be simpler, all you have to do is place a bet and click on the Spin button. You win every time identical symbols appear on a payline. Some bonus symbols allow you to have multipliers or a variable number of free spins. The Gamble feature is present, which allows you to try to double the last win.

What is the software provider of The Big Easy?

The Big Easy is produced by IGT software house. Among the most famous titles are Fortune Coin, Raging Storms, Baywatch. All of these slots are available for free on our site. If you want to know all the IGT titles, you can find a complete list on SlotJava.
